pullRequest.title: [WFLY-13023] Upgrade MicroProfile Config 1.4
pullRequest.bodyText:
Upgrade smallrye-config 1.6.0
Update the GAV of smallrye-config artifacts

JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13023


MicroProfile Config 1.4 Release Notes
smallrye-config 1.6.0 Release Notes

beforeCommit.message:
[WFLY-13023] Upgrade MicroProfile Config 1.4

* Upgrade smallrye-config 1.6.0
* Update the GAV of smallrye-config artifacts

JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13023

Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil <jmesnil@redhat.com>

afterCommit.message:
[WFLY-13023] Upgrade MicroProfile Config 1.4

* Upgrade smallrye-config 1.6.0
* Update the GAV of smallrye-config artifacts
* Removed invalid assertions from MicroProfileConfigTestCase: if the
  only value provided by @ConfigProperty is invalid, the deployment must
  fail.
JIRA: https://issues.redhat.com/browse/WFLY-13023

Signed-off-by: Jeff Mesnil <jmesnil@redhat.com>

afterCommit.message:
[WFLY-13023] Upgrade MicroProfile Config 1.4

* Upgrade smallrye-config 1.6.1

  fail.

nodes.bodyText: What is the reason for removing this asserts? Is it related with eclipse/microprofile-config#446 ?
Please re-alphabetize. (I think it's important as EAP productization files PRs to fix it any time it's not in order.)
